question: Agency-Adding agents, confirming certification status, agent next steps, and editing agent profile
text:
Agency-Adding agents, confirming certification status, agent next steps, and editing agent profile
          
        
NOTE: All information included in this walkthrough guide includes mock consumer information. No real consumer information is used in this guide.

How to add agents to your agency
Step 1: Navigate to your dashboard and select Add a New Agent under the Agents tab.
Step 2: Complete the Agent Information form with the agents details and click next. This is the agent that is being added to the agency.
Step 3: Complete the Agent Profile Information form with the agents details and click next. This is the agent that is being added to the agency.
You will receive an Account Registration Complete message and the agent will be placed into a Pending certification status.
How to confirm an agents certification status as an agency manager
Step 1: Log-in to your agency account and navigate to the Dashboard. Select Agents and then View Agent List to view each agents certification status.
Newly added agent next steps
Step 1: Agent will receive an email invitation to set up their agent account on the agent portal. It is important that the agent act as soon as possible as the invite expires in 24 hours.
Step 2: Click the invitation link in the email to create an agent portal account. The agent should be routed to the New Account Set-Up landing page.
Step 3: Select the method to receive a verification code. Email or phone call and click Send Code.
Step 4: Enter the verification code and click Verify.
Step 5: Complete the New Agent Account Set-Up and click Submit.
Step 6: The agent will land on their Certification Status page.
How to edit an agents profile as an agency manager
Step 1: Navigate to your dashboard and select View Agent List under the Agents tab.
Step 2: Search for the agent you wish to update be entering their first and last name and click Go.
Step 3: Click the Gear icon next to the agents name and select Edit. You can only edit agents with a certification status of Certified.
Step 4: Click Edit to update the agents information such as name, license number and expiration date, agent email address, primary number, business, or correspondence address and then Save to update the information. NOTE: Primary phone number is the number which will be displayed in the agent directory. Often the agency vs individual agent phone number is desired for the directory and would be updated via the primary phone number field.
